Articles.Content:
---------------

Edited August 1, 2018 by flying_chair
When life gives you lemons, you turn them into rocket fuel for Jebidiah\'s boosters.
When life gives you lemons, throw them back at life, yelling, 'I wanted oranges!'
When life gives you lemons, you give the lemons back, and you say, 'I don\'t want your damn lemons!' Then you order you\'re engineers to make incidentary lemons and you burn life\'s house down!
When life gives you lemons, ingore them and everything else live gives to you and make a KSP plugin.
When life gives you lemons, squeeze the juice into life\'s eyes.

Your lemonade is going to really suck unless life gives you water and sugar too.

When life gives you lemons, don\'t make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get Mad! I don\'t want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life\'s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I\'m the man whose gonna burn your house down - with the lemons! I\'m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that\'ll burn your house down!
When life gives you lemons, kill Joshua21B with them to prevent more damage.
When life gives you lemons, dare your friends to eat them whole.
When life gives you lemos... you forget what to say
When life gives you lemons... You know that you won\'t survive on the current food sources available.
When life gives you melons When life gives you lemons, you know you did something wrong.

When life gives you lemons....

you need MOAR BOOSTARS!

When life gives you lemons...

... sell then on eBay.

When life gives your lemons...

You shit is full of lemon acid.

Your lemonade is going to really suck unless life gives you water and sugar too.

When life gives you lemons, don\'t make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get Mad! I don\'t want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life\'s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I\'m the man whose gonna burn your house down - with the lemons! I\'m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that\'ll burn your house down!

Good old Cave Johnson from Portal 2.

When life gives you lemons, give them back, get limes, paint them yellow, and say to life 'Hey want some lemons?'

Then watch life eat the 'lemons' and laugh as his face nearly turns inside out from eating the limes.
Damn, I wanted to make the first Portal Two reference. >
Skip to 0:09

When life gives you lemons...

eat them and poop it on madspy

ha ha

When life gives you lemons...

eat them and poop it on madspy

ha ha

When life gives you lemons....

Squeeze the juice into dylan1234\'s eyes.

Ha Ha.

When life gives you lemons...

Don\'t be ungrateful, Mad and Dylan.

Ha Ha

When life gives you lemons...

Don\'t be ungrateful, Mad and Dylan.

Ha Ha

When life gives you lemons...

Give them away for free to all of your fellow kerbals on the forum.

'Accidentally' neglect Nooblet68 and say 'Ha Ha' as he cries because he has no lemons.

-

Edited October 17, 2016 by Lolnewb the rocketeer

We are having fun.

When life gives you lemons,

Make lemonade

Sell it on streets

Get arrested

Get fined Â£500,000
